Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides a disability presumption to members of public retirement systems
Summary: Provides that a member of a public retirement system who has been determined to have a permanent partial disability by the workers' compensation board of the state of New York, and who the United States social security administration has determined is disabled for substantial gainful activity, and approved for social security disability benefits, shall be deemed to be disabled for the purposes of eligibility for disability benefits of such public retirement system.
LawCode: Add ยง810, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing a disability presumption to members of public retirement systems
